content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
add glassmorphism tailwind styling to this top nav and please generate a background image of a purple nebula
"Got it, incorporating glassmorphism and generating a purple nebula background."

replace the background with pink background
Understood, I'll replace the background with pink.
